field.label: enable
field.help: This will activate the BGP service.

field.label: BGP AD Distance
field.help: Adjust BGP administrative distance, typically set to 20. Useful if you want to prefer OSPF-learned routes.

field.label: Router ID
field.help: Optional fixed router ID for BGP.

field.label: Graceful Restart
field.help: Enable BGP graceful restart as per RFC 4724, allowing packet forwarding during protocol restoration.

field.label: Network
field.help: Defines connected networks to be advertised over BGP. Disable Network Import-Check to announce all networks.

field.label: Network Import-Check
field.help: When enabled (default), BGP only announces networks set at 'Network' if they are present in the routers routing table (alternatively, you can also set a null-route via System -> Routes). If disabled, all configured networks will be announced.

field.label: Log Neighbor Changes
field.help: Enable extended logging of BGP neighbor changes.

field.label: Route Redistribution
field.help: Select routing sources to redistribute to other nodes.
